description:
The Major and Smith clash over Section 9`s new mission hunting post-humans. She orders Togusa to investigate a suspected spy near the Prime Minister.
Source: netflix

titles.title: ASSEMBLE トグサの死によってもたらされる事象
Assemble: Togusa no Shi ni Yotte Motarasareru Jishou
Assemble: What Came About as a Result of Togusa`s Death
REUNIFICADOS - Após a morte de Togusa
